title: Land F/X Mobile App
text: Mobile App built with Xamarin Forms in C#, XAML, PHP, MySQL. Allows account creation. Displays learning video library, upcoming events, and news to clients.

title: Black Friday Sale
text: Webpage built with PHP, HTML, CSS, JS. Wild, wacky, and eye-catching design to show off sale discounts and rules.

title: Products
text: Webpage built with HTML, CSS, JS. Displays available Land F/X products. Clean simple design.

title: Flight Event
text: Webpage built with HTML, CSS, JS, PHP. Invitation page to join a tradeshow event at the San Diego Air and Space Museum.

title: Video Library
text: Webapp built with HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySQL. Organized 500+ videos into 13+ categories and an adjusting number of subcategories. Returned JSON that allowed weighted Javascript search based on titles then descriptions. Single state page that adjusted content without reload.

title: 30-Day Challenge
text: In-software webapp built with HTML, CSS, JS. Software learning program used by new clients, trial users, and even as part of university curriculums. 45+ lessons that interfaced directly with the software to confirm completion or failure. Comformed to IE6 requirements due to software limitations.
